description:
Use this resource to create, and delete New Relic NRQL Drop Rules. -> **IMPORTANT!** Version 2.0.0 of the New Relic Terraform Provider introduces some [additional requirements](/docs/providers/newrelic/index.html) for configuring the provider.

Before upgrading to version 2.0.0 or later, it is recommended to upgrade to the most recent 1.x version of the provider and ensure that your environment successfully runs `terraform plan` without unexpected changes.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AccountId.description:
Account where the drop rule will be put. Defaults to the account associated with the API key used.
* `description` - (Optional) The description of the drop rule.
* `nrql` - (Required) A NRQL string that specifies what data types to drop.
* `action` - (Required) An action type specifying how to apply the NRQL string (either `drop_data` or `drop_attributes`).

Action.description: An action type specifying how to apply the NRQL string (either `drop_data` or `drop_attributes`).

Description.description:
The description of the drop rule.
* `nrql` - (Required) A NRQL string that specifies what data types to drop.
* `action` - (Required) An action type specifying how to apply the NRQL string (either `drop_data` or `drop_attributes`).

Nrql.description:
A NRQL string that specifies what data types to drop.
* `action` - (Required) An action type specifying how to apply the NRQL string (either `drop_data` or `drop_attributes`).
